hooks.prompt:
A subagent has completed. Check the workflow state and determine the next action:

1. If implementation-agent completed: Run pre-review gates (deslop-work + test-coverage-checker in parallel)
2. If review-orchestrator completed with approval: Run delivery-validator
3. If review-orchestrator completed without approval: Run deslop-work on fixes, then retry review
4. If delivery-validator approved: Run docs-updater, then proceed to ship
5. If delivery-validator rejected: Return to implementation with fix instructions

The workflow is fully autonomous - no human intervention after plan approval.

Return: {"ok": true} to continue the workflow.
